6e12be02556352e2c17e4e21770f9aa490da47c6:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll MAXN = 1010;
const ll MOD = 998244353;

#define upper ((rlen[i][j] - 1) % MOD)

ll n, m, c, f;
ll a[MAXN][MAXN];  // true -> can not plant
ll rlen[MAXN][MAXN], dlen[MAXN][MAXN];
ll lensum[MAXN][MAXN];
ll bigsum[MAXN][MAXN];
ll csum = 0, fsum = 0;
inline ll mod_add(const ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return ((aa % MOD) + (b % MOD)) % MOD;
}
inline ll mod_addi(ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return aa = mod_add(aa, b);
}
inline ll mod_mul(const ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return ((aa % MOD) * (b % MOD)) % MOD;
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);

    if (false) {  // Redirect file input
        freopen("plant.in", "r", stdin);
        freopen("plant.out", "w", stdout);
    }

    int t, id;
    cin >> t >> id;
    while (t--) {
        memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
        memset(rlen, 0, sizeof rlen);
        memset(dlen, 0, sizeof dlen);
        memset(lensum, 0, sizeof lensum);
        memset(bigsum, 0, sizeof bigsum);
        csum = 0, fsum = 0;
        cin >> n >> m >> c >> f;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
                char ch;
                cin >> ch;
                a[i][j] = ch - '0';
            }
        }

        for (int i = n; i >= 1; i--) {
            for (int j = m; j >= 1; j--) {
                if (a[i][j]) {
                    rlen[i][j] = 0;
                    dlen[i][j] = 0;
                    lensum[i][j] = 0;
                    bigsum[i][j] = 0;
                } else {
                    rlen[i][j] = rlen[i][j + 1] + 1;
                    dlen[i][j] = dlen[i + 1][j] + 1;
                    if (rlen[i][j] >= 2) {
                        lensum[i][j] = mod_add(lensum[i + 1][j], rlen[i][j] - 1);
                        bigsum[i][j] = mod_add(bigsum[i + 1][j], (rlen[i][j] - 1) * (dlen[i][j] - 1));
                    } else {
                        lensum[i][j] = lensum[i + 1][j];
                        bigsum[i][j] = bigsum[i + 1][j];
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if (not(c == 0 && f == 0)) {
            // BEGIN METHOD 2
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
                for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
                    if (dlen[i][j] >= 3 && rlen[i][j] >= 2) {
                        mod_addi(csum, mod_mul(upper, lensum[i + 2][j]));
                        mod_addi(fsum, mod_mul(upper, bigsum[i + 2][j]));
                        //~ cerr<<"Pos "<<i<<", "<<j<<": "<<upper<<" * "<<bigsum[i+2][j]<<"\n";
                    }
                }
            }
            // END METHOD 2
        }

        if (c != 0) {
            cout << mod_mul(c, csum) << " ";
        } else {
            cout << "0 ";
        }
        if (f != 0) {
            cout << mod_mul(f, fsum) << "\n";
        } else {
            cout << "0\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll MAXN = 1010;
const ll MOD = 998244353;

#define upper ((rlen[i][j] - 1) % MOD)

ll n, m, c, f;
ll a[MAXN][MAXN];  // true -> can not plant
ll rlen[MAXN][MAXN], dlen[MAXN][MAXN];
ll lensum[MAXN][MAXN];
ll bigsum[MAXN][MAXN];
ll csum = 0, fsum = 0;
inline ll mod_add(const ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return ((aa % MOD) + (b % MOD)) % MOD;
}
inline ll mod_addi(ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return aa = mod_add(aa, b);
}
inline ll mod_mul(const ll& aa, const ll& b) {
    return ((aa % MOD) * (b % MOD)) % MOD;
}

int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);

    if (false) {  // Redirect file input
        freopen("plant.in", "r", stdin);
        freopen("plant.out", "w", stdout);
    }

    int t, id;
    cin >> t >> id;
    while (t--) {
        memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
        memset(rlen, 0, sizeof rlen);
        memset(dlen, 0, sizeof dlen);
        memset(lensum, 0, sizeof lensum);
        memset(bigsum, 0, sizeof bigsum);
        csum = 0, fsum = 0;
        cin >> n >> m >> c >> f;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
                char ch;
                cin >> ch;
                a[i][j] = ch - '0';
            }
        }

        for (int i = n; i >= 1; i--) {
            for (int j = m; j >= 1; j--) {
                if (a[i][j]) {
                    rlen[i][j] = 0;
                    dlen[i][j] = 0;
                    lensum[i][j] = 0;
                    bigsum[i][j] = 0;
                } else {
                    rlen[i][j] = rlen[i][j + 1] + 1;

                    } else {
                        lensum[i][j] = lensum[i + 1][j];
                        bigsum[i][j] = bigsum[i + 1][j];
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        if (not(c == 0 && f == 0)) {
            // BEGIN METHOD 2
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
                for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
                    if (dlen[i][j] >= 3 && rlen[i][j] >= 2) {
                        mod_addi(csum, mod_mul(upper, lensum[i + 2][j]));
                        mod_addi(fsum, mod_mul(upper, bigsum[i + 2][j]));
                        //~ cerr<<"Pos "<<i<<", "<<j<<": "<<upper<<" * "<<bigsum[i+2][j]<<"\n";
                    }
                }
            }
            // END METHOD 2
        }

        if (c != 0) {
            cout << mod_mul(c, csum) << " ";
        } else {
            cout << "0 ";
        }
        if (f != 0) {

        } else {

        }
    }
    return 0;
}
